nodes.text: Anakin Skywalker's red Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor
Anakin Skywalker flew this red and white Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor in 21 BBY.

In 21 BBY, this starfighter was piloted by Anakin Skywalker during the Cortosis Battle Droid threat. He flew it from Coruscant on a mission to Mos Espa on Tatooine. When Coruscant was then attacked, Anakin returned there in it. Soon afterward, he used the ship to travel to Metalorn to destroy the Cortosis Battle Droid factory. Anakin would also end up using the stock Delta-7 during a skirmish with pirates at Varonat and subsequently when rescuing his thought to be dead Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi at Riflor.
